Recommendations: 1. Calibration of laboratory equipment/apparatus be done and be reflected in the inventory list and be duly signed by the laboratory in-charge and other concerned personnel.
2. The maintenance team and/or laboratory in-charge shall ensure that the laboratory equipment are functional.
3. A program for the continuing modernization and upgrading of the instructional laboratories, facilities and equipment be formulated.
4. Annual training program in the laboratory operations and safety be provided for both the students, faculty and staff.
5. Laboratory manuals, catalogs and other references be made available inside the laboratory rooms.
6. Substantial, updated and properly signed documents be presented.
